text:
Beshak. 

Faith doesn't mean not to take precautions. 

Islam actually guides us to limit travel in pandemics & to "tighten the rope of the camel & then place the faith in Almighty"

#Chloroquine #COVID #CoronaVirusUpdate #Covid_19 #CoronavirusPandemic #StayAtHomeChallenge https://t.co/TFSOonnIB3
